= Featured Users =

== Willow Garage ==
[http://www.willowgarage.com Willow Garage] has been using TREX to demonstrate robust autonomy in the domain of mobile manipulation. TREX has been integrated with the [http://pr.willowgarage.com/wiki/ROS ROS] platform.
[http://www.willowgarage.com/blog/2009/06/03/watch-milestone-2 Here] is an example of T-REX controlling a [http://www.willowgarage.com/pages/robots/pr2-overview PR2] to navigate, open doors, and plug itself in. 

== The Monterey Bay Aquarium Research Institute ==
TREX was first developed at the [http://www.mbari.org/ Monterey Bay Aquarium Research Institute (MBARI)] where it is used to control [http://www.mbari.org/AUV/ Autonomous Underwater Vehicles] for oceanographic research. 
[http://www.mbari.org/autonomy/TREX/index.htm This page] tracks the history and ongoing activities of that effort.
